QueryConfig.QueryValue: SELECT AF.ACCTNO,CF.FULLNAME CUSTNAME,AF.BANKACCTNO, BI.BANKCODE,BI.BANKNAME,BI.USERIDKEY,BI.ACCESSKEY,BI.PRIVATEKEY FROM AFMAST AF,CFMAST CF,CRBDEFBANK BI WHERE AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND AF.BANKNAME=BI.BANKCODE
SELECT BANKCODE,ROOTCODE,BANKNAME,USERIDKEY, ACCESSKEY,PRIVATEKEY,PFXKEYNAME,PFXKEYPASS, SIGNER,SIGNERPASS,RECEIVER,MINAMOUNTI,MINAMOUNTG,STATUS FROM CRBDEFBANK ORDER BY BANKCODE
SELECT REFBANK BANKCODE,TRFCODE,REFDORC DORC,REFUNHOLD UNHOLD,REFACCTNO,REFACCTNAME,MSGID FROM CRBDEFACCT ORDER BY REFBANK,TRFCODE
